attributes.action: Evacuate children from Rafah, Gaza to a place of safety in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Allow children from Rafah, Gaza refuge in the UK until the danger is over.
attributes.background: There is planned military action due in Rafah, Gaza and the children are in mortal danger.
